plugin.description: Sets how the application core data (users,roles,etc) is stored.
plugin.label: Configurations Management

param.description: Image displayed next to the user name
param.label: Avatar
param.name: avatar

param.description: Default workspace shown after log in. 'Home' is the welcome page with activity and search engine.
param.label: Default Workspace
param.name: DEFAULT_START_REPOSITORY

param.description: If set, this action will be triggered automatically at users login. Can be logout (to lock out the users), pass_change (to force password change), or anything else
param.label: Users Lock Action
param.name: USER_LOCK_ACTION

param.description: Maximum number of shared users per user
param.label: Shared users limit
param.name: USER_SHARED_USERS_LIMIT

global_param.description: Allow users to generate public links on files
global_param.label: Files: enable public links
global_param.name: ENABLE_FILE_PUBLIC_LINK

global_param.description: Enable internal file sharing (sharing with users existing or temporary users)
global_param.label: Files: enable internal sharing
global_param.name: ENABLE_FILE_INTERNAL_SHARING

global_param.description: Allow users to generate public links on folders
global_param.label: Folders: enable public links
global_param.name: ENABLE_FOLDER_PUBLIC_LINK

global_param.description: Enable internal folder sharing (sharing with users existing or temporary users)
global_param.label: Folders: enable internal sharing
global_param.name: ENABLE_FOLDER_INTERNAL_SHARING

global_param.description: Mandatory prefix for users created temporary users login
global_param.label: Tmp users prefix
global_param.name: SHARED_USERS_TMP_PREFIX

global_param.description: Minimum length of the generated hash
global_param.label: Hash minimum length
global_param.name: HASH_MIN_LENGTH

global_param.description: Allow users to manually choose a hash for the generated links
global_param.label: Hash user-editable
global_param.name: HASH_USER_EDITABLE

global_param.description: Maximum share expiration limit for file, 0 = unlimited
global_param.label: Maximum file expiration limit
global_param.name: FILE_MAX_EXPIRATION

global_param.description: Maximum download limit for file, 0 = unlimited
global_param.label: Maximum file download limit
global_param.name: FILE_MAX_DOWNLOAD

global_param.description: Do not allow users to create public links, only private links (password-protected)
global_param.label: Set password mandatory
global_param.name: SHARE_FORCE_PASSWORD

global_param.description: Create and display QRCode for shared link
global_param.label: Create QRCode
global_param.name: CREATE_QRCODE

plugin.description: Browser-based rich interface. Contains configurations for theming, custom welcome message, etc.
plugin.label: Client Plugin

global_param.description: Theme used for display
global_param.label: Theme
global_param.name: GUI_THEME

global_param.description: Enable the small tour triggered at first visit
global_param.label: Enable Welcome Tour
global_param.name: ENABLE_WELCOME_TOUR

global_param.description: For security, disconnect user if there was no activity. Set to the cookie expiration by default.
global_param.label: Web Interface auto-logout after inactivity
global_param.name: CLIENT_TIMEOUT

global_param.description: Alert the user that the web session is about to expire. Number of minutes before session expiration
global_param.label: Warning Before Session Expiration
global_param.name: CLIENT_TIMEOUT_WARN

global_param.description: Custom HTML you want to be included in the pages header. Beware, make sure to put valid HTML here!

global_param.description: Do not display address book in user account panel.

global_param.name: DASH_DISABLE_ADDRESS_BOOK

global_param.description: Display file and folders activities in the right-hand info panel
global_param.label: Show file/folders activities
global_param.name: ACTIVITY_SHOW_ACTIVITIES

global_param.label: Minimal length
global_param.name: PWPOLICY_MIN_LENGTH

plugin.description: Main container for core Pydio settings (application title, sharing, webdav server config, etc...)
plugin.label: Pydio Main Options

global_param.description: This title will appear as the window title, in the splash screen.
global_param.label: Application Title
global_param.name: APPLICATION_TITLE

global_param.description: Default language when a user does not have set his/her own.
global_param.label: Default Language
global_param.name: DEFAULT_LANGUAGE

plugin.description: Display a standard user/password login screen
plugin.label: Standard login screen

plugin.description: Tools for migrating data from other platforms to Pydio Cells
plugin.label: Migration

plugin.description: Options shared by all uploaders plugins
plugin.label: Uploaders Options

global_param.description: Maximum size per file allowed to upload.
global_param.label: File Size
global_param.name: UPLOAD_MAX_SIZE

global_param.description: Filter the files that are allowed to be uploaded, by extensions. Use a comma-separated list.
global_param.label: Extensions List
global_param.name: ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS

global_param.description: User readable label for the list of allowed extensions (images, all files, etc).
global_param.label: Ext. Label
global_param.name: ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS_READABLE

global_param.description: Switch to Multipart Upload for files bigger than this value (in bytes)
global_param.label: Multipart Threshold
global_param.name: MULTIPART_UPLOAD_THRESHOLD

global_param.description: Chunk Size used for multipart uploads, must be bigger than 5MB (5242800B)
global_param.label: Multipart Parts Size
global_param.name: MULTIPART_UPLOAD_PART_SIZE

global_param.description: Number of concurrent uploads (maximum 6, due to browsers limitations)
global_param.label: Queue Size
global_param.name: MULTIPART_UPLOAD_QUEUE_SIZE

global_param.description: Request Timeout (in minutes) for each concurrent part upload
global_param.label: Timeout
global_param.name: MULTIPART_UPLOAD_TIMEOUT_MINUTES

plugin.description: Options applied to all auth drivers
plugin.label: Authentication

global_param.description: Raise the security of the login form by disabling autocompletion and remember me feature
global_param.label: Secure Login Form
global_param.name: SECURE_LOGIN_FORM

global_param.description: Add a Forgot Password link at the bottom of the login form
global_param.label: Enable Forgot Password
global_param.name: ENABLE_FORGOT_PASSWORD

global_param.description: Action to trigger when clicking on Forgot Password. Can be changed to trigger a custom action if you rely on external authentication system.
global_param.label: Forgot Password Action
global_param.name: FORGOT_PASSWORD_ACTION

global_param.description: Whether users can create their own cells or not
global_param.label: Let user create new cells
global_param.name: USER_CREATE_CELLS

global_param.description: Allow the users to create a new user when sharing a folder
global_param.label: Create external users
global_param.name: USER_CREATE_USERS

global_param.description: List of parameters to be edited when creating a new shared user.
global_param.label: External users parameters
global_param.name: NEWUSERS_EDIT_PARAMETERS

global_param.description: Use this option to avoid automatic reloading of the interface state (last folder, opened tabs, etc)
global_param.label: Skip interface preferences
global_param.name: SKIP_USER_HISTORY

global_param.description: Maximum number of users displayed in the users autocompleter
global_param.label: Users completer limit
global_param.name: USERS_LIST_COMPLETE_LIMIT

global_param.description: Minimum number of characters to trigger the auto completion feature
global_param.label: Users completer min chars
global_param.name: USERS_LIST_COMPLETE_MIN_CHARS

global_param.description: Directory search is looking for labels 'starting with' the search string. Switching this on will prepend a wildcard to look for labels 'containing' the string.
global_param.label: Auto-wildcard search
global_param.name: USERS_LIST_AUTO_WILDCARD

plugin.description: Allows Pydio Cells to offer the choice between multiple oauth providers to choose from
plugin.label: Authfront OAuth

plugin.description: Javascript Client for Enterprise REST Apis
plugin.label: Enterprise SDK

plugin.description: Actual way to authenticate users (via credentials, certificates, http, etc)
plugin.label: Authentication FrontEnd

global_param.description: Disable chat rooms for all users
global_param.label: Disable Chats
global_param.name: GLOBAL_DISABLE_CHATS

global_param.description: Website Favicon (make sure to use a PNG image)
global_param.label: Favicon
global_param.name: CUSTOM_FAVICON

global_param.description: Top-right logo displayed on minisite page
global_param.label: Public Links Logo
global_param.name: CUSTOM_MINISITE_LOGO

global_param.description: Display a custom title on login screen (will replace Enter login/password)
global_param.label: Login Custom Title
global_param.name: CUSTOM_LOGIN_TITLE

global_param.description: Additional description phrase displayed below the login title
global_param.label: Login Custom Legend
global_param.name: CUSTOM_LOGIN_LEGEND

global_param.description: Use a custom logo for emails sent to users. Please provide a valid HTTPS url (typically an image hosted on your website) as it will be loaded by users mail readers.
global_param.label: Emails Template Logo
global_param.name: EMAIL_TEMPLATE_LOGO

global_param.description: Replace the footer string by your own sentence or copyright string.
global_param.label: Emails Template Footer
global_param.name: EMAIL_TEMPLATE_FOOTER

global_param.description: This setting can emulate multi-tenancy by letting users see only their own group and users of their own group. By default, everyone can see all users from all groups. When enabled, sibling groups cannot see themselves. Beware that users inside groups can still see upper level users. This is useful only for 1-level of groups.
global_param.name: TENANCY_LEGEND

global_param.description: Switching this setting will launch a background task to re-affect permissions to all users.
global_param.label: Users visible only to their group
global_param.name: USERS_GROUPS_TENANCY

global_param.description: Hide groups in sharing auto-complete dialog and in the visibility screens. This can be an additional security to make sure that users will not share a document with their whole group by error.
global_param.name: DISABLE_SHARE_GROUPS_LEGEND

global_param.description: Toggle to hide groups from sharing dialog.
global_param.label: Hide groups from sharing dialogs
global_param.name: DISABLE_SHARE_GROUPS

ajxpdriver.description: Welcome Page displaying a list of workspaces
ajxpdriver.label: Welcome Page

global_param.description: URL to iOS App (leave empty if you want to hide the block)
global_param.label: URL to iOS App
global_param.name: URL_APP_IOSAPPSTORE

global_param.description: URL to Android App (leave empty if you want to hide the block)
global_param.label: URL to Android App
global_param.name: URL_APP_ANDROID

global_param.description: URL to Windows sync application (leave empty if you want to hide the block)
global_param.label: Windows PydioSync URL
global_param.name: URL_APP_SYNC_WIN

global_param.description: URL to Mac sync application (leave empty if you want to hide the block)
global_param.label: Mac PydioSync URL
global_param.name: URL_APP_SYNC_MAC

editor.description: Geolocation feature to either display a WMS layer or simply place an exif-localized photo. Requires OpenLayers
editor.label: Map viewer
editor.title: openlayer.1

editor.description: Syntax Highlighter for all supported code source files
editor.label: Source Viewer
editor.title: code_mirror.2

editor.description: Display the Exif metadata contained inside the JPG files. Can locate the image on a map if it contains geolocation data.
editor.label: EXIF Extractor
editor.title: editor.exif.2

editor.description: Image viewer, used for previewing images and browsing them in a diaporama. Generates a thumbnail version of the images.
editor.label: Image viewer

global_param.description: Threshold for low-res versions of images
global_param.label: Low-res Sizes
global_param.name: PREVIEWER_LOWRES_SIZES

global_param.description: Rotate image using exif rotation
global_param.label: Exif Rotation
global_param.name: EXIF_ROTATION

editor.description: Uses HTML5 or Flash to play a sound
editor.label: Sound Player
editor.title: sm_editor.2

meta.description: Extracts the EXIF metadata of a JPG image. Used in conjunction with editor.exif
meta.label: Exif Metadata

global_param.description: Comma separated list of fields, use syntax 'EXIF_SECTION.ExifName'.
global_param.label: Info Panel Fields
global_param.name: exif_meta_fields

global_param.description: Associated list of labels, be sure to define as many as fields!
global_param.label: Info Panel Labels
global_param.name: exif_meta_labels

meta.description: Keep tracks of all files modifications
meta.label: Files Versioning

meta.description: Display a chat-like feed on every nodes
meta.label: Comments Feed

param.description: Maximum number of characters for each comment
param.label: Comment limit
param.name: COMMENT_SIZE_LIMIT

global_param.description: Inform the user or not if the file already exists (default behaviour, the user will be able to change this preference)
global_param.label: Existing Files
global_param.name: DEFAULT_EXISTING

global_param.description: Default value for automatically starting upload or not
global_param.label: Auto Start
global_param.name: DEFAULT_AUTO_START

global_param.description: Default value for automatically closing the dialog after upload or not
global_param.label: Auto Close
global_param.name: DEFAULT_AUTO_CLOSE

global_param.description: Size of requests used to test if files already exists
global_param.label: Stat Slices
global_param.name: DEFAULT_STAT_SLICES
